column4: Today (2024-Jun-07) is Skirophoriṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Σκιροφοριῶνος, day 326 of 354 in the year 2023/2024.
This Skirophoriṓn will have 29 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) as opposed to a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) of 30.

Festivals in Skirophoriṓn:

3: Arrhephoria (Ἀρρηφόρια)
12: Skira (Σκίρα)
14: Dipolieia (Διπολίεια)

Today (2024-Jul-06) is Hekatombaiṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Ἑκατομβαιῶνος, day 1 of 355. Happy New Year 2024/2025! 🏺🏺🏺

2024/2025 will be an ordinary year of 355 days, ending on 2025-Jun-25. As an ordinary year there will be 12 months (1/2):

Hekatombaiṓn: Jul 06–Aug 04
Metageitniṓn: Aug 05–Sep 03
Boēdromiṓn: Sep 04–Oct 02
Puanopsiṓn: Oct 03–Nov 01
Maimaktēriṓn: Nov 02–Dec 01
Posideiṓn: Dec 02–Dec 30

Months in 2024/2025 (2/2):

Gamēliṓn: Dec 31–Jan 29
Anthestēriṓn: Jan 30–Feb 28
Elaphēboliṓn: Mar 01–Mar 29
Mounukhiṓn: Mar 30–Apr 27
Thargēliṓn: Apr 28–May 27
Skirophoriṓn: May 28–Jun 25
This Hekatombaiṓn will have 30 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) as opposed to a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) of 29.

Festivals in Hekatombaiṓn:

7: Hekatombaia (Ἑκατόμβαια)
12: Kronia (Κρόνια)
16: Synoikia (Συνοικία)
28: Panathenaia (Παναθήναια)
